The qualities of the Buddha [an3.75:5.1]: Supreme guide for those who wish to train
Sensible people can know it for themselves
The qualities of the Saṅgha [an3.75:5.1]: Consists of the four pairs, the eight individuals
Worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods
